# CST.Identifier type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Identifier = [name: Syntax<string>] | [namespace: Syntax<string>, separator: Syntax<':'>] | [namespace: Syntax<string>, separator: Syntax<':'>, name: Syntax<string>];
```
**References:** [Syntax](./messageformat.cst.syntax.md)
